scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -p "[{name}]" -c "green.bold,cyan.bold" "cd server && npm start"  "sleep 5 && cd client && npm start"
scripts.deploy: concurrently -n server,client -p "[{name}]" -c "green.bold,cyan.bold" "npm run deploy-server" "npm run deploy-client"
scripts.deploy-client: cd client && git add . && git commit -m 'automatic' && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy-server: cd server && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'automatic' && git push heroku master
